sentences.sContent: I’ve looked everywhere but I can’t find the map.
sentences.sCn: 我到处都找过了，但就是找不到地图。

sentences.sContent: The south should remain dry, but everywhere else will have heavy rain.
sentences.sCn: 南部持续干旱，但其他地区会下暴雨。

sentences.sContent: ...red can be seen everywhere in Spring festival and other celebrating occasions...
...There are many natural beauties everywhere and many national minorities provide tourists with variety of colorful cultural experience...
...these parents made me understand the problem of our age: as technology becomes almost everywhere in our lives...
...but there is a lot of traffic everywhere today because of the football game...
...off season when everywhere is less crowded and hotels cost less...
